alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeast Natrona County through 445 PM MDT... At 408 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homa Hills, or 11 miles north of Casper, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bar Nunn around 415 PM MDT. Casper around 420 PM MDT. Mills, Evansville, Red Butte and Paradise Valley around 425 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Beartrap Meadows County Park and Casper Mountain. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 180 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If you are outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to ponding of water on area roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
